## SessionManager.getRemoteVideoTrack() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use remoteMediaStream and get track from the stream.
> 

The remote video track, if available.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRemoteVideoTrack(session: Session): MediaStreamTrack | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  session | Session | Session to get track from. |

<b>Returns:</b>

MediaStreamTrack \| undefined
